question: Nowadays, parents are allowing their children to use tablets and smartphones to enhance learning.Do the advantages of this development outweigh the disadvantages?
text: In recent times, many children are using  mobile phones and smart tabs which are given by parents for educational purposes. As the world is moving through the digital age it became necessary for most people. In the following , an essay I will explain the benefits of using automation and the drawbacks of misuse.

Firstly, technology plays a significant role in our modern life, youngsters are habituated to using smartphones and tabs for their learning purpose and it is also used for entertainment like playing video games and chatting with friends. It became easier to connect with family members and friends via online apps. Few schools have  adopted online learning with smart technology. For ,example kindle is an app where we can find a lot of books and activities to complete. Therefore students can improve their skills with the help of adults also.

Secondly, the negatives of using mobiles can be misused by youngsters. This is because of internet access especially children stick to entertainment and games rather than learning. Moreover, they are also facing health issues like eyesight and obesity. Nowadays, advertisements popups on screen while browsing which have adult images this can make unnecessary thoughts into the minds of the younger generation. This gadget can make them addicted to the online world. ,Additionally parents should encourage them to play outdoor activities which make them physically and mentally strong. Parents can lock their tabs and phone with restricted apps. Therefore control will be on them.
To conclude, despite of drawbacks of using technology the benefits are more for educational purposes and social interaction makes them productive.
